locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great place to stop I inquired my last time here that they clean the fans in the shower !! So since that didn’t work maybe this will showered this morning in shower 2 !!

… 3) supposed no wait for a shower, 20 minutes later I finally get one (read above as to why) when I did get a shower, it hadn't even been cleaned. Toilet had piss all over, soap was all over the shower, floor was wet hadn't even taken time …

Wasted over an hour of my time on trying to get a shower I was in position one for over an hour. Makes no sense. Only four showers available at that location, but instead I checked in being number one on the list, but sat there in the …

… but tonight they have no hot water! I just drove 689 miles to this fuel stop to stay the night and shower and was told they been all day with no hot water because of hot water tank was no good. Also, the men's restroom looked like it …
… They fed me and allowed me to shower and stay as long as I was needed to feel safe to travel... …

If you need a shower you should of got one before here there is only two showers so be ready to wait for a longer time for a shower and I stood at subway for 10 minutes watching the boy that was supposed to be working subway work at …

Sorry only two stars . Got in late at night went in to take a shower everyone was huddled at the fuel desk place was clean but shower had black mold all over the floor and shower floor and walls ! Employees mostly goofing off just huddled …
Bought 110 gallons of fuel and wnted to charge me 13.00 for a shower. I will never buy fuel here again
90 minutes for a shower. I will buy my fuel somewhere else from now on.
The shower is dirty as hell

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Dirty truck stop. Get ready to wait for shower 2 hours at 11:30 pm. Avoid this congested filthy stop
Over an hour to get into a shower, there were 4 people ahead of me. Went back to see what might be going on there are 4 vacant showers. 2 stars only because… well they do have showers.

I paid $18 for shower , I spend more then 40 minutes and waiting for warm water , I didn’t got warm water ,
One of the worst shower I saw here .

Went from old and dirty to remodeled Still dirty service is horrible waited over an hour to shower Mid afternoon Sitting in subway waiting on a shower Floor dirty all tables are dirty  Staff at front counter always eating and looks like …

Should be 10 stars!! Filled up my truck…parked, took a shower and then noticed I didn’t receive any points for my fill up. So I went to the front desk and had the absolute pleasure of meeting Valerie. She didn’t just fix the error, she took …

… lady on the desk said they don’t print out for customers anymore so my question is why some of them can and others don’t? You can do better Stanford Pilot. Poor service. On that part ,place was clean also the shower food wasn’t bad either.
Cold shower!  New truck stop.  Big mess outside!  Dirty place.  I do not recommend.
… Cons: Shower #2, dead bolt does not work.  Pretty sure had our debit card info stolen from a card skimmer in one of their self check outs. (Refuse to use those registers in this store again).

Hubby and I stopped in here about a month ago for the night.  I was dying for a nice hot shower... the shower room itself was nice and spacious however,   the shower was COLD! Not a drop of hot water... there's no way they didn't know this …

… that's everything is new but has its problems.   At 7am no showers available, nobody is showering just half a dozen unclean showers (had to wait 20 minutes for shower to be cleaned).  Bathroom was filthy and so was dining area by …
